effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 745,638.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,592, further increased by 943 while you remain within its light.
